Oblitertron:




As Oblitertron fell downward he didn't notice the damage done by a third of 
the shots fired by the numerous robots, which was somewhat bad, but it wasn't 
that bad, and he ignored it because of his rage at Defensor.  NO ONE knocked 
Oblitertron and lived.  NO ONE.
